ingredients.content: 50 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces (3 cm)
500 g fennel bulb, fresh, thinly sliced and leaves
320 g Carnaroli rice (18 minute cooking time)

preparations.content: Place Parmesan and fennel leaves in mixing bowl then chop <b>25 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place sliced fennel, 20 g butter, water, a pinch of salt in mixing bowl then cook <b>10 min/100°C//speed 0.5<b>. Remove half of the fennel and juices then set aside, leaving remainder in the bowl.
Add wine, rice and butter, then cook without measuring cup, <b>3 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Scrape base of mixing bowl to release rice.
Add hot stock and a pinch of salt then cook <b>13 min/100°C//speed 1<b>.
Transfer to a large serving bowl, add reserved Parmesan mix and cooked fennel, then stir together with spatula. Serve immediately.
